author: radekkapka
content: As far as Beacon API is concerned, I think we have everything merged in already apart from events and potentially https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/472. Can we come to consensus on what to do with events soon, maybe by end of this week? As I mentioned in https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/710831784991916072/1290262887247384586, I think I slightly prefer a v2 but the `versioned_xxx` option is also fine.
